name: 01-3D Platformer SGD102
description:
Game designed to practice C++ in Unreal. Based on the Hour of Code project files.

Run and jump your way across floating islands to collect coins and find the end goal. Use power ups along the way to reach new areas. Don't fall or touch the spiked hazards.

~~CONTROLS~~

  • WASD - Move
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • E Key - Interact when prompted
  • ALT + F4 - Quit
